tales.name: Vuter Vobisyot
tales.author: Suman Barick
tales.description: the difference between cow and crow is that cow is a female domesticated ox or other bovine, especially an adult after she has had a calf or cow can be (uk|dialect) a chimney cowl while crow is a bird, usually black, of the genus
